history.proof: intros b Hb a. exists (a / b, a mod b). split. - apply chRem3. qsimpl use: Z_div_mod. qsimpl use: Z_div_mod. hauto use: Nat.mul_comm, Nat.neq_0_lt_0, Nat.div_mod unfold: gt. - qsimpl use: Z_div_mod. qsimpl use: Z_div_mod. sauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment b : nat Hb : b > 0 a : nat Unable to unify "let (q, r) := Z.div_eucl ?M1421 ?M1422 in ?M1421 = (?M1422 * q + r)%Z /\\ (0 <= r < ?M1422)%Z" with "Z.of_nat a = Z.of_nat (fst (a / b, a mod b) * b + snd (a / b, a mod b))".

In environment H : forall a b : Z, (b > 0)%Z -> let (q, r) := Z.div_eucl a b in a = (b * q + r)%Z /\\ (0 <= r < b)%Z b : nat Hb : b > 0 a : nat Unable to unify "b > 0" with "Z.of_nat a = Z.of_nat (a / b * b + a mod b)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment b : nat Hb : b > 0 a : nat Unable to unify "let (q, r) := Z.div_eucl ?M1879 ?M1880 in ?M1879 = (?M1880 * q + r)%Z /\\ (0 <= r < ?M1880)%Z" with "S (snd (a / b, a mod b)) <= b".
In environment H : forall a b : Z, (b > 0)%Z -> let (q, r) := Z.div_eucl a b in a = (b * q + r)%Z /\\ (0 <= r < b)%Z b : nat Hb : b > 0 a : nat Unable to unify "b > 0" with "b > a mod b".

original: intros b Hb a. exists (a / b, a mod b). split. - apply chRem3. apply Z_div_mod. apply Hb. - apply Z_div_mod. apply Hb.
